data.title: Customer service????
data.text: You would expect some great customer service coming from an old mom and pops restaurant but definitely not the case here. We pulled up the drive up window guy comes down a opens window and says absolutely nothing no hi or can I help you nothing just looks at me I even had to tell him the other car was there before me . The entire experience with the person taking our order was below average if you ask me. Food well it was ok nothing I would rush back for

data.title: The Ark Drive In. A Old Style Southern stop for good cheap eats
data.text: The Ark Drive In is one of Jacksonville NC oldest restaurants. It is a small restaurant built in the shape of a ship. It is a local favorite for giving you great food at cheap prices. Nothing is made until you drive up. The menu is based on fried chicken and seafood. Both are very good and are done old style. Your dinner is placed on a cardboard tray and covered with French fries. And a cup of Cole slaw. Did I mention that every plate also gets Hush Puppies! These are awesome. If you not run off by an old basic walk up style eatery and you have to either eat in the car or take your food home this place is for you.
